name: AS Assignment for Routers
description: This slideset was presented at the Passive and Active Measurement (PAM) conference in April 2010. It was also presented at the ISMA 2010 AIMS-2 workshop in February 2010 and the CAIDA-WIDE-CASFI workshop in April 2010.
